name: beginningwithai
description: Interactive AI learning platform with adaptive lessons and hands-on coding exercises

scripts.test:production: npm run build && npm run test:coverage
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npx serve -s build
scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && echo 'Build complete! Check build folder size:' && du -sh build/
scripts.deploy:hosting-only: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.check-env: node -e "console.log('Environment check:', process.env.NODE_ENV); console.log('Firebase API Key:', process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_API_KEY ? 'Set' : 'Missing'); console.log('OpenAI API Key:', process.env.REACT_APP_OPENAI_API_KEY ? 'Set' : 'Missing');"
scripts.pre-commit-check: npm run build && echo 'âœ… Pre-commit checks passed!'
scripts.check-unused-imports: echo 'ðŸ” Checking for unused imports...' && echo 'Note: ESLint not configured yet'
scripts.quick-health-check: echo 'ðŸ¥ Running health check...' && npm run check-unused-imports
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.fix-corruption: mv node_modules node_modules_broken_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) && rm -f package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.dev-session-start: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting development session...' && npm run health-check && echo 'âœ… Health check passed! Starting server...' && npm start
